languages.text: "Позвольте вопрос — как вышло, что миссионер Экклезиархии оказался другом и соратником известного пирата?"
"A question, if I may — how was it that an Ecclesiarchy missionary came to be a friend and associate of a famous pirate?"
languages.original_text: "Позвольте вопрос — как вышло, что миссионер Экклезиархии оказался другом и соратником известного пирата?"

traits.locale_text: "A question, if I may — how was it that an Ecclesiarchy missionary came to be a friend and an associate of a famous pirate?"
"A question, if I may — how was it that an Ecclesiarchy missionary came to be a friend and an associate of a famous pirate?"
"A question, if I may — how was it that an Ecclesiarchy missionary came to be a friend and associate of a famous pirate?"
"A question, if I may — how was it that an Ecclesiarchy missionary came to be a friend and associate of a famous pirate?"
"A question, if I may — how was it that an Ecclesiarchy missionary came to be a friend and associate of a famous pirate?"

languages.text: “请允许我问个问题，国教的传教士怎么会和恶名昭著的海盗成为朋友？”
languages.original_text: "A question, if I may — how was it that an Ecclesiarchy missionary came to be a friend and associate of a famous pirate?"

traits.locale_text: “请允许我问个问题，国教的传教士怎么会和恶名昭著的海盗成为朋友？”

languages.text: «Una pregunta, si me lo permite: ¿cómo acabó un misionero de la Eclesiarquía haciéndose amigo de un famoso pirata?».
languages.original_text: "A question, if I may — how was it that an Ecclesiarchy missionary came to be a friend and associate of a famous pirate?"

traits.locale_text: «Una pregunta, si me lo permite: ¿cómo acabó un misionero de la Eclesiarquía haciéndose amigo de un famoso pirata?».

languages.text: 「聞きたいことがある。帝国聖教会の聖務団の宣教師が、なぜ悪名高い海賊と友達になれたんだ？」
languages.original_text: "A question, if I may — how was it that an Ecclesiarchy missionary came to be a friend and associate of a famous pirate?"

traits.locale_text: 「聞きたいことがある。帝国聖教会の聖務団の宣教師が、なぜ悪名高い海賊と友達になれたんだ？」

languages.text: "Gestattet mir eine Frage – wie wurde ein Missionar der Ekklesiarchie zu einem Freund und Partner eines berühmten Piraten?"
languages.original_text: "A question, if I may — how was it that an Ecclesiarchy missionary came to be a friend and associate of a famous pirate?"

traits.locale_text: "Gestattet mi eine Frage – wie wurde ein Missionar der Ekklesiarchie zu einem Freund und Partner eines berühmten Piraten?"

languages.text: « J'ai une question, si vous le permettez : comment un missionnaire de l'Ecclésiarchie est-il devenu l'ami et l'associé d'un pirate notoire ? »
languages.original_text: "A question, if I may — how was it that an Ecclesiarchy missionary came to be a friend and associate of a famous pirate?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai une question, si vous le permettez : comment un missionnaire de l'Ecclésiarchie est-il devenu l'ami et l'associé d'un pirate notoire ? »

languages.text: "İzninle bir soru soracağım. Bir Ekleşiarşi misyoneri nasıl oldu da ünlü bir korsanın dostu ve ortağına dönüştü?"
languages.original_text: "A question, if I may — how was it that an Ecclesiarchy missionary came to be a friend and associate of a famous pirate?"

traits.locale_text: "İzniniz olursa bir soru soracağım. Bir Ekleşiarşi misyoneri, nasıl oldu da ünlü bir korsanın dostu ve ortağı hâline geldi?"
